item.description:
Are you one of those people who just wants some peace of mind? Do your thoughts and worries torment you and keep you from feeling peace? People often say that they would give most anything to have peace of mind. Why is it so elusive? Real peace of mind comes from knowing the spiritual thruths that we are masters of our minds and that life and God are good. Come and learn how to reap the peaceful fruits of a disciplined and faithful mind.

 

Mother Clare Watts is the co-director of a mystical Christian school and Order called the Order of Christ Sophia. She is an ordained Master Teacher and Priest, holding a Master’s Degree in Counseling Psychology with post-graduate training in Jungian Analysis, and is a Certified Professional Midwife. She is also the author of Giving Birth to God: A Woman's Path To Enlightenment. Watch her on YouTube.


Friday, April 20, 7:30 am

 

Suggested Donation $25, Bring a Friend for Free!
item.name: Peace of Mind: Worry-Free Days, Restful Nights
